articles.content:

articles.title: 'Lin Dan is undoubtedly the greatest. He is alone at the top' - ESPN India
articles.description: Lin Dan, who called time on his two-decade career on Saturday, left five generations of Indian badminton stars awestruck. They recollect the attributes that made him the GOAT.
